Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 12 Piercing and can infect creatures with a disease
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tentacle, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 7 Bludgeoning plus 4 Piercing and can grapple
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tentacle Slam, The Otyugh slams creatures it is grappling into each other or a solid surface, doing an Average 10 Bludgeoning damage and stunning the creatures

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Otyugh makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Tentacles

Abilities.Ability 1: Limited Telepathy, The Otyugh can magically transmit simple messages to nearby creatures.  The recipient can not respond with this ability
